title: No. 56: N. Jomelli, from a recueil of etchings
marks:
Signature

 LRC, in the plate: [A.L. De La Live Sculp.]
description: portrait bust in a cartouche of a man with heavy cheeks wearing a powdered wig with a ribbon; \"N. JOMELLI\" at bottom of cartouche with inscription below
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
artist: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully
